info.name: Test-Screen
info.description:
Minimalistic design - inspired by some hardware test found on my Thinkpad.
Min 60 fps guaranteed ;-)

renderpass.code:
#define RX (.5*iResolution.x)
#define RY (.5*iResolution.y)
#define A trunc(.1*RY)  //grid size

void mainImage(out vec4 O, in vec2 U){
    U= abs(U-.5*iResolution.xy);  //H-V mirrored coords

    float o= min(mod(U.x,A), mod(U.y,A));  //grid
    o= min(o, abs(U.x*RY/RX - U.y));  //diagonals
    o= min(o, abs(length(U) - RY));  //large circle
    o= min(o, abs(length(U - .4*iResolution.xy) - 2.*A));  //small circles

    O= vec4(1.-o);
}
renderpass.name: Image
